entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix error when running new template maui app on iOS #24525
    Backlog
  • ListView in TabbedPage not showing anything until different tab selected. #24522
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Change the LineStackingStrategy to BlockLineHeight for Labels on Windows #24520
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Scrolling to the top in a collection view has poorer performance. #24517
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Rendering issue in WinUI when setting Label.FormattedText #24516
    Backlog
  • [Android] Spacing in the ItemsLayout of CollectionView stops it from scrolling. #24511
    Backlog
  • [development.md] Clarify what Android dependencies are needed #24510
  • Visual Studio(17.11.2)版本无法使用MAUI模板 #24508
  • Issue with iOS App Installation and Debugging in MAUI #24506
  • File Picker on Android Hangs for Large Video #24505
  • Label line height doesn't work on android #24504
    Backlog
  • InputTransparent does not work on iOS on picker #24503
    Backlog
  • Using Binding with OnIdiom throw this exception on release mode only: InitializeComponent () System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Binding' to type 'System.Boolean'. #24500

Closed

  • ListView inside ContentView inside StackLayout: scrolling does not work #24455

PullRequests

Created

  • Added Google Cloud Map Styles support for Android. #24526
    community ✨, area-controls-map
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24523
    area-infrastructure
  • [Binding SG] Refactor intercepted method verification #24514
    area-xaml
  • [X] do not look for parent DataType on collections #24513
    area-xaml
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml with 8.0.82 SR8.2 #24519
  • [Testing]Changed Scroll to 12, added comment #24494
    area-testing
  • [ci] Specify x86 runtime identifiers for Android device tests API27 #24509
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] [ci] Specify x86 runtime identifiers for Android device tests API27 #24512

Updated

  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, 9.0-rc2
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
    area-navigation
  • Improve Android device type check #24495
    area-testing
  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
    area-infrastructure, stale
  • Cache SKPath to PathF.PlatformPath in Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia #21169
    area-drawing, stale
  • [Android] [iOS] [macOS] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    stale, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area-controls-window
  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area-xaml, stale
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure, stale
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area-xaml, stale
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, stale, area-gestures
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area-xaml, stale
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, stale
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, stale
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, stale, t/desktop
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area-gestures
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area-xaml, stale
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-templates, area-controls-switch, stale
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, stale
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, stale, area-keyboard
  • Make sure to await async test asserts #19994
    area-testing, stale
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc2
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Make the screenshot comparison more strict #24335
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Remove netPrevious TFMs from RC/GA #24488
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
